## FieldImage.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `FieldImage` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(src: string | typeof Field.SKIP_SETUP, width: string | number, height: string | number, alt?: string, onClick?: (p1: FieldImage) => void, flipRtl?: boolean, config?: FieldImageConfig);
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

src


</td><td>

string \| typeof [Field.SKIP\_SETUP](./blockly.field_class.skip_setup_property.md)


</td><td>

The URL of the image. Also accepts Field.SKIP\_SETUP if you wish to skip setup (only used by subclasses that want to handle configuration and setting the field value after their own constructors have run).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

width


</td><td>

string \| number


</td><td>

Width of the image.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

height


</td><td>

string \| number


</td><td>

Height of the image.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

alt


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional alt text for when block is collapsed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

onClick


</td><td>

(p1: [FieldImage](./blockly.fieldimage_class.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional function to be called when the image is clicked. If onClick is defined, alt must also be defined.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

flipRtl


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to flip the icon in RTL.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

config


</td><td>

[FieldImageConfig](./blockly.fieldimageconfig_interface.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A map of options used to configure the field. See the \[field creation documentation\][https://developers.google.com/blockly/guides/create-custom-blocks/fields/built-in-fields/image\#creation](https://developers.google.com/blockly/guides/create-custom-blocks/fields/built-in-fields/image#creation) for a list of properties this parameter supports.


</td></tr>
